messages.subject: New homeschooler has questions.......
messages.msgSnippet: Would love some input on a basic unschooling day. That will look so different from family to family! I think a great way to get a feel for day-to-day stuff
messages.messageBody:
"Would love some input on a basic unschooling
day."

That will look so different from family to family! I think a great way
to get a feel for day-to-day stuff is to read at unschoolers blogs. If
you visit our "links" here at the site, there are a LOT of blogs
listed to peruse.

I was just reading all the funshop presenters for the Live and Learn
conference today and sat here thinking "WOW, there are SO many cool
and interesting people that unschool."

I already knew that...truly. But to have so many descriptions in one
place reminds you of what a hugely diverse mass of people unschoolers
are. Very cool.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
